channel.title: General Site Fixes
channel.description:
[b]Private Server Client Hacking: Talk about your exploits with the 317 client here.[/b]
Like the rest of the sections board descriptions, it should say RS2 client, because it's more than just 317
[b]Development Teams Post your development teams here. They must first be approved by a moderator before they will appear.[/b]
Last sentence should be removed, as it is not true anymore.
Post your other site fixes, maybe somebody will look at them :P
EDIT - Also, don't post your opinions of things that should change (new sections etc), just things that are obviously wrong.

item.title: General Site Fixes
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:5, topic:378607”][quote author=Wintercanon link=topic=474472.msg3469455#msg3469455 date=1295185512]

One thing that has always gotten me is…

As it only shows up on the front page yet if you click “here”, it opens a new webpage and links you to the front page.
[/quote]They’re global messages for both moparisthebest.com and moparisthebest.com forums, it is mainly for the people trying to load the Java Programming forums on MITB with Runscape Private Server junk…

Im sure when you first came, you typed in moparscape and found both sites. only real dumb ass’s would choose the wrong one :l[/quote]I didn’t choose the wrong one, what are you talking about?

Read full topic
